prompt: Design a map view page with a full-screen map and a playful, colorful theme. Include a top app bar with the title 'Fun Map' in bold white text, a rainbow gradient background (from red to violet), and a white back arrow icon. Add a floating action button in the bottom-center with a white GPS icon and a rainbow gradient background matching the app bar. The map area should have a light yellow background (Colors.yellow[100]) with rounded corners (12px radius). Use Material Design with a fun and vibrant aesthetic, ensuring smooth animations and a cheerful interface.
